Package controller

Class CustomerRecords

java.lang.Object
controller.CustomerRecords
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerRecords extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the CustomerRecords View.

    • customerWindow

      private javafx.stage.Stage customerWindow(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent, CustomerCtrl controller) throws IOException
      This method initializes the customer window with the chosen controller.

      LAMBDA: Sets an inline method to fire when the window is closed, refreshing CustomerRecords with new data.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - An action from the user.
      controller - The controller for the Customer View.
      Returns:
      The initialized window.

    • selectCountry

      public void selectCountry(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      When a country is selected, filters out customers not in selected country.

      LAMBDA: Compares the Customer's country against the selected country.

    • selectState

      public void selectState(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      When a state is selected, filters out customers not in selected state.

      LAMBDA: Compares the customer's state/division against the selected state/division.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - An action from the user.
